recent_changes.summary: Added new plan telemetry snapshot capturing baseline artifact, stubbed policy notes, and agent roster metadata for the 2025-10-14 rehearsal.
Recorded tasks stage telemetry with stubbed policy indicators and tool.status ready for the latest rehearsal run.
Published normalized four-agent roster extracted from the new plan telemetry bundle.
Stored jq validation output proving schema v1 coverage for plan telemetry 2025-10-14.
Captured jq checks for tasks telemetry, confirming command/specId/timestamp/tool.status fields are present.
Logged diff between rehearsal mock HAL payload and baseline sample, documenting no functional drift.
Explained continued SPEC_OPS_POLICY_* stubs and mapped follow-up actions for clean policy runs.
Updated size audit with new timestamp and total footprint for the mini bundle.
Expanded table to eight rehearsal tasks tied to 2025-10-14 evidence artifacts.
Appended unlock posture entry for 2025-10-14, citing mock HAL mode and outstanding policy follow-up.
Regenerated checksums covering refreshed telemetry outputs and retired obsolete diff/size files.
Rebased plan deliverable on 2025-10-14 telemetry bundle and acceptance mapping.
Updated T49 tracker row with 2025-10-14 validation note pointing to refreshed rehearsal artifacts.

edge_cases: Telemetry JSON uses stubbed policy fields; downstream tools must tolerate status="skipped" while overrides remain active.
Mini bundle stays under 100 KB; scripts consuming fixture-size logs should handle timestamped filenames.
Roster JSON intentionally stores agent metadata without tokens/cost; consumers must not assume those keys exist.
